meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Indonesia.
meanings.sent1: In Indonesia, people use rupiahs to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rupiahs at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The rupiahs in my wallet were having a party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a million rupiahs.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rupiahs fluttered in the wind like confetti.

meanings.definition: A sum of money in rupiahs.
meanings.sent1: He owed me fifty rupiahs for the ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The total cost came to two thousand rupiahs.
meanings.sent3: I found a jar filled with rupiahs under my bed.
meanings.sent4: Her love was worth more than all the rupiahs in the world.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rupiahs clinking together was music to my ears.
